message.entry: Maximum number of edges and nodes are expected to be finite.
Maximum number of edges and nodes are expected to be scalar, numeric and positive.
The two node IDs for addRelativePose method cannot be the same.
addPointLandmark cannot specify an edge constraint between two pose nodes, or between two landmark nodes, or from a landmark node to a pose node.
addRelativePose cannot specify an edge constraint between a landmark and a pose node, or between two landmark nodes.

The supplied node ID pairs are not acceptable.

 Possible causes: 
 1. Both node IDs do not exist in pose graph.
 2. One of the node IDs is greater than the number of nodes plus one.
The supplied information matrix is not positive definite.
Cannot remove edge(s) {0}. Only loop closure edges can be removed.

Invalid input relative pose. Expected [x y theta] scalar vector for 2-D poses or [x y z qw qx qy qz] for 3-D poses. The specified relative pose when converted to transformation matrix form contains NaN values.
